public abstract class LogicAction<I extends Logic,O>
extends EditableAction<FormulaHolder<I>,O>

A LogicAction takes a FormulaHolder as the input.

isApplicable

public boolean isApplicable(Tab tab)
Description copied from class: WindowAction
Returns true if this action is applicable to a specified tab. By default, this action is applicable to any tab.
